channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overhanging, 14th August
item.description:
Tree outside 57 Greenway , Chislehurst is overhanging my front garden. Can it be pruned please
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole road, street cleansing not done, 14th August
item.description:
Rubbish abd recycling from collection and week of people dropping litter still here, whole road needs proper street cleansing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 79, Southlands Road, Bickley, London

item.title: Uncovered hole, 14th August
item.description:
There is a hole which is I'm assuming used to access a pipe which has no longer got its cover and has been like it for a few months now. It is just before 2 castledine Road in the middle of the pavement. My son hurt his foot in it today.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Castledine Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet
